channel.title: Command for making admins and mods with out files
channel.description: Does anybody have the command for making admins and mods with out files on them atm... I need it quickly so please help.! Thanks :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 12:12:39 PM[/size][hr]DOES ANYBODY KNOW IT!

item.title: Command for making admins and mods with out files
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod isaac”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}

and

else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod isaac”)) {

String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Command for making admins and mods with out files

item.title: Command for making admins and mods with out files
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

sgt yoshi.
ignore case does exactly what it says, ignores the command unless your name is the one you gave them
so i wouldnt use admin as the name or someone can make them all admins with the right name

item.title: Command for making admins and mods with out files
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Would this work?

else if (command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have been made Moderator by "+playerName+."); c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); kickPlayer("+playerName"); sendMessage("You just made "+command.substring(4)+" a moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Instead of them logging out, it would kick them, and then they log in and have mod rights?

If there is anything wrong with what I posted let me know.

Just trying to help

Read full topic
item.source: Command for making admins and mods with out files

item.title: Command for making admins and mods with out files
item.dc:creator: @W_W_E W W E
item.description:
@W_W_E wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“hide”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“W W E”)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been made a hidden admin by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 4;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just made “+command.substring(5)+” a hidden administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if (command.startsWith(“owner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“W W E”)) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been given co-owner rights by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.sendMessage(“Please Note: This does not make you the legit co-owner.”);
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just gave “+command.substring(6)+” co-owner rights”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if (command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“W W E”)) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been made Administrator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just made “+command.substring(6)+” administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if (command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“W W E”)) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been made Moderator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” a hidden administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if (command.startsWith(“remove”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“W W E”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been removed from the staff by “+playerName+”.”);
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“You just removed “+command.substring(7)+” from the staff.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

where u see W W E just add ur name and ur all set

Read full topic
